oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate prisoners at Camp Douglas, IL
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nesbitt served in Co. H, Brown's 55th Tenn. Inf. These men were taken prisoner at the capture of Island No. 10 in April 1862. Camp Douglas was on the south side of Chicago, Ill.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
